comment: /**  * Determine whether the transactional resource is ready for local optimizations.  * @return {@code true} if the resource is known to be entirely transaction-local,  * not affecting any operations outside of the scope of the current transaction  * @see #isReadOnly()  */
code: /**  * Determine whether the transactional resource is ready for local optimizations.  * @return {@code true} if the resource is known to be entirely transaction-local,  * not affecting any operations outside of the scope of the current transaction  * @see #isReadOnly()  */ boolean isLocalResource().
